quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning.
A losing trade, I assure you, sir: literature is a drug.
All good is hard. All evil is easy. Dying, losing, cheating, and mediocrity is easy. Stay away from easy.
Bargain... anything a customer thinks a store is losing money on.
Courage is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.
I always thought of losing my virginity as a career move.
Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning.
A losing trade, I assure you, sir: literature is a drug.
All good is hard. All evil is easy. Dying, losing, cheating, and mediocrity is easy. Stay away from easy.
Bargain... anything a customer thinks a store is losing money on.
Courage is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.
I always thought of losing my virginity as a career move.
I postpone death by living, by suffering, by error, by risking, by giving, by losing.
I think people are rapidly losing confidence in the political class, and I don't blame them.
I'm afraid of losing my obscurity. Genuineness only thrives in the dark. Like celery.
I've been on such a losing streak that if I had been around I would have taken General Custer and given points.
If you are losing your leisure, look out! You are losing your soul.
If you are losing your peace in your quest for peace, you are not on the road to peace. The road to peace is peace.
If you can accept losing you can't win. If you can walk you can run. No one is ever hurt. Hurt is in your mind.
If you're afraid of losing, then you daren't win.
If you're coasting, you're either losing momentum or else you're headed downhill.
Learn as though you would never be able to master it; hold it as though you would be in fear of losing it.
Losing a game is heartbreaking. Losing your sense of excellence or worth is a tragedy.
Losing an illusion makes you wiser than finding a truth.
Losing faith in your own singularity is the start of wisdom, I suppose; also the first announcement of death.
Never change a winning game; always change a losing one.
No one grows old by living. Only by losing interest in living.
People are losing the capacity to listen to words or follow ideas.
The eruption of lived pleasure is such that in losing myself I find myself; forgetting that I exist, I realize myself.
The fear of losing is what makes competitors so great. Show me a gracious loser and I'll show you a permanent loser.
The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
The only thing wealth does for some people is to make them worry about losing it.
The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
This is the worst of life, that love does not give us common sense but a sure way of losing it.
When I was losing, they called me nuts. When I was winning they called me eccentric.
Winning is a habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.
You need to play with supreme confidence, or else you'll lose again, and then losing becomes a habit.
You've got to get to the stage in life where going for it is more important than winning or losing.
